identity.name: Maya Groom Pro
principles: Emotion: Trust and Warmth through color
Clarity: Calendar is the heart, keep it breathable
Tactility: Paper-like textures and soft shadows

buttons.primary: bg-[#C75B2A] text-white hover:bg-[#B04A1E] rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all shadow-md hover:shadow-lg active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-[#2D2A26] border border-[#E6D5C3] hover:bg-[#F5EBE0] rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-[#6B665F] hover:text-[#C75B2A] hover:bg-[#C75B2A]/10 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-colors

cards.default: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-sm border border-[#E6D5C3]/50 p-6 hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300
cards.interactive: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-sm border border-[#E6D5C3]/50 p-6 cursor-pointer hover:border-[#C75B2A] hover:shadow-md transition-all group

inputs.default: bg-white border border-[#E6D5C3] rounded-lg px-4 py-3 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#C75B2A]/20 focus:border-[#C75B2A] outline-none transition-all placeholder:text-[#6B665F]/50

navigation.bottom_bar: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-md border-t border-[#E6D5C3] py-3 px-6 flex justify-between items-center z-50 md:hidden shadow-[0_-4px_20px_rgba(0,0,0,0.05)]
navigation.sidebar: hidden md:flex flex-col w-64 bg-white border-r border-[#E6D5C3] h-screen sticky top-0 p-6

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.03'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

setup: Install fonts: Outfit and Plus Jakarta Sans via Google Fonts
Configure Tailwind theme with the palette above
Apply the noise texture to the body pseudo-element

calendar_logic.interaction: Click empty slot to create, Drag to move
calendar_logic.visuals: Current time indicator is a solid #C75B2A line with a dot

universal_rules: Do not use pure black (#000000). Use #2D2A26.
Do not use default shadows. Use the custom soft shadows.
Ensure all text on the Cream background has sufficient contrast.
